article_title: Retail clinics an important piece of health care system
article_text: With their rapid and continuing growth, health care retail clinics have transformed from a store-by-store novelty into a way to address the two great challenges of American health care: cost and access.

article_metadata.news-keywords: retail health care, Affordable Care Act, doctors, telemedicine
